title: Is There Free Project Hextech Chest
body: Is There Free Project Hextech Chest. If you achieve Level 5.

replies.body: There currently aren't any free augmented caches directly.  You can use IP to obtain the 3 icon supply caches.  Doing so will provide 3 augment cache fragments to create one augment chest.  More details are also available in our [project disruption](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ) guide.  Hope that helps!
I don't believe so, but you should be able to get PROJECT: Hextech chests from the store, some even for IP!
